committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second Sunday of each December as "Honor Thy Parents Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the second Sunday of December of each year as "Honor Thy Parents Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second Sunday of each December as "Honor Thy Parents Day".
